{{Quote|Balian, to the Rangers.|[[Lord Commander]] [[Jeor Mormont]]|You Win or You Die}}

'''Balian''' is an unidentified background character in the [[Season 1|first season]]. He is a newly made Ranger of the [[Night's Watch]], of the same group of recruits as [[Jon Snow]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, there's no member of the Night's Watch called Balian.
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 1]]===
Balian is present during the speech Lord Commander [[Jeor Mormont]] gave to the "graduating" recruits. Balian is assigned to the Rangers.<ref>"[[You Win or You Die]]"</ref>
